website_summaries.verdict: A cruelty-free blow dry spray that adds body and softness to your hair without weighing it down.
cons: A few have said it made their hair greasy

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but need to use a lot of it
customer_reviews.text: This gives my hair so much more volume, makes my fine, curly hair look thicker than it actually is. I took off a star because I do have to use a lot of this product to get optimal results (which is discouraging, considering the price) and because it does dry my hair out a bit. I do leave in a bit more leave-in conditioner or hair milk/cream to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: abbey

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times now and I can confirm that I can tell a difference between when I do and when I don't. It doesn't add a super large amount of volume, but it does add a nice amount of lift at the roots and thickens the hair overall. I can also usually skip the dry shampoo on day two hair when using this product - which is a great bonus. It goes on clear and doesn't leave a residue or buildup either.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ok, not the best
customer_reviews.text: at least it did not dry my hair out. BUT IT DOESNT DO ANYTHING FOR MY HAIR. ALSO SEEMED TO GIVE MY HAIR A RED TONE.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: Natural and nourishing for my locks
customer_reviews.text: Love this company for all my hair needs. The natural ingredients and thoughtful packaging truly makes this a unique find. I highly recommend Briogeo to curly or straight haired ladies that want to eschew the chemically laden products on the mainstream market. Can't speak highly enough
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Adams

customer_reviews.title: I’m on my third bottle, love it
customer_reviews.text: This works and doesn’t weigh my hair down. Definitely adds volume and has a pleasant light smell that doesn’t last. Just air drying leaves my hair looking great.
customer_reviews.author: IRead

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I found this through an Ipsy sample and fell in love. I have fluffy, curly hair and had never thought to use a volumizing spray. this adds just the right amount of lift to my roots. Also it smells incredible.
customer_reviews.author: M.Wood

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, provides volume but after a day or two ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, provides volume but after a day or two it leaves a residue on your scalp, you need to wash with a good scalp cleansing shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I like the smell or not but definitely helps add volume
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The volume is real!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the volume this adds!! Wish the scent was different ... it's not bad at all, just a very mild, generic scent. I spray this mainly on my roots and blow dry. Whoa! The volume is real, and my hair is soft.
customer_reviews.author: April Baker

customer_reviews.title: It’s water...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t do anything for my hair. I felt like I was spraying water on my hair. I had no volume from this. Definitely do not recommend and it was way to pricey for not working
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect volumizer!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing for fine hair! I get lots of body after using it. It is virtually odorless, so it won’t interfere with scents from other hair product. I’d highly recommend it! Plus, it’s eco friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Giraud

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and it worked well. The scent was okay. Definitely added volume to my hair and made it feel very soft! Will update once I get to use the product more
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple fragrance! Love that it keeps my hair full!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Expected much better
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with this, will not buy any more of this product. The price is too high for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: hollyhock

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have a lot of fine hair, this definitely helps with volume!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte H.

customer_reviews.title: Şoft hair
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it , it’s not greasy and makes my hair soft instantly
customer_reviews.author: Sahar Ghannam

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: It puts volume in my thin hair and makes it look full.
customer_reviews.author: PANSY WILLIS

customer_reviews.title: Nice but..
customer_reviews.text: Adds a little bounce to my roots while keeping everything shiny. Smell isn't overpowering either, and it fades after drying. One caveat, in addition to being pricey, it does fade my semi-permanent glaze to a reddish tone (I do this for gray coverage in between salon visits). Other products don’t do this. If this product doesn’t give me long term growth along my hairline, I’ll discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Give a little boost to your hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blow dry spray when I want to give my hair a little added volume. It works well for me, doesn’t smell bad and always lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No noticable results
customer_reviews.text: I did not really see any difference in my hair or roots in general after using this product for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Fine hair best friend
customer_reviews.text: This product smells a bit odd but not bad. BUT! It works so well for fine hair! Thank you for giving me volume
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Beall

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was recommended in a magazine and Igave it a try
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was recommended in a magazine and Igave it a try, awesome. I have dry, thick, coarse hair and this is great. I put it on damp hair along with a little mousse before blowing out, love it. My hair comes out with body, but so soft, shiny and feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Short

customer_reviews.title: and I love everything they make
customer_reviews.text: Just recently became a Briogeo customer, and I love everything they make. I have come to depend on the them to make my hair look great.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great to add some volume to my thin hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Ford

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is not worth it
customer_reviews.text: There were no earthshaking differences in volume with this product. In addition, it made my hair tangle. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzblau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to short fine' lots of hair' do's.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a sample. Since, I have thrown out all my other products! My hair is cut in a bob. Lots of fine hair. This gave it a bounce without weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Pelican

customer_reviews.title: Quality Brand
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, but it kind of made my thin hair feel coarse and knotty. I have been using water + essential oils (Cedarwood, Peppermint, Lavender, and Argon Oil) sprayed on my hair at night, and I feel that has helped drastically with the volume and overall appearance of my hair (more-so than the 1,000s of products I've tried in the past). Castor oil treatments help, too. I do really like Briogeo products, however, and find that their Rosarco Milk (Reparative Leave-In Conditioning Spray) works really well for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Elyse

product_meta.title: Briogeo Blossom & Bloom Ginseng Biotin Spray, 5 oz
feature_bullets: PUMP UP THE VOLUME:Briogeo’s Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Spray contains natural hair thickeners and clarifying agents to soak up oil as its produced. This dual-action hair volume spray promotes immediate hair fullness enhancement and longer-term thickness results. It’s ideal for fine, thin or limp hair and includes natural clarifying agents, lemon and witch hazel, help to absorb excess oil and extend time between blowouts.

UNIQUE BLEND OF NUTRIENTS OFFER IMMEDIATE AND LONG-TERM RESULTS:For the immediate term, the formula contains a unique ingredient—maltodextrin, a natural sugar starch—to coat each strand of hair and promote a fuller appearance. For long term benefits, the spray contains ginger and ginseng to support natural blood flow to the scalp to promote follicle health, while biotin supports the hair shaft.

ADDITIVE AND CRUELTY-FREE:Briogeo is proud to say that Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Spray is 98% naturally derived. Specially formulated, this hair volumizer for thin, fine hair does not include sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA, or artificial dyes. It’s certified gluten-free and cruelty-free so you can feel good about looking good!

PERFECT FOR TREATED HAIR:The incredible ingredients in this volumizing spray make it the ideal product for nourishing and maintaining treated hair. Whether you routinely color your hair or use a keratin or chemical treatment, the unique blend of vitamins and nutrients will help keep your hair looking and feeling its best!

ABOUT BRIOGEO:Beautiful hair shouldn’t be compromised by harsh or harmful ingredients. Briogeo offers a high-performance hair care collection that is naturally based, yet performance driven to provide visible results. All Briogeo formulas live up to their performance claims – providing the vibrant, beautiful and healthy hair we constantly strive to achieve.
